effect.diamond_pearl: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.platinum: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.platinum: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It may also be used to warp to the last Poké Center visited.
flavor_text.platinum: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It may also be used to warp to the last Poké Center visited.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.
